title: Deryl Dodd-One Ride In Vegas
description:
Released in 1996 this is one of my favorite CDs. I can listen to the whole album without wanting to skip any song. The title track "One Ride in Vegas" is a wonderful rodeo song and I think that his cover of   "That&#039;s How I Got to Memphis" is the best track on the album. "Friends Don&#039;t Drive Friends" certainly should have gotten more airplay. But for a sentimental, sad song "This Ol&#039; World (Keeps Turning on Me)" is a real winner. I also appreciate the fact that he writes most of his own stuff. 

1996 mp3 320vbr

track list

01-Friends Don&#039;t Drive Friends
02-That&#039;s How I Got To Memphis
03-Movin&#039; Out To The Country
04-Stayin&#039; Is The Only Way To Go
05-Somethin&#039; Like That
06-This Ol&#039; World Keeps Turning On Me
07-One Ride In Vegas
08-13 WMZ
09-I Can Love You
10-That&#039;s Just me
